title: Firefox for Android 47.0 Release

notes.note: Add "Show/Hide web fonts" in advanced settings to reduce bandwidth and data
Remove Favicons in Awesomebar to prevent HTTPS spoofing
Remove support for Android web runtime (WebRT)
"Open multiple links"  setting under “Customize” has been renamed to “Tab Queue”
Stopped data usage when Firefox is in the background and a page uses meta refresh
WebCrypto: PBKDF2 supports SHA-2 hash algorithms

text: We'd also like to extend a special thank you to all of the new Mozillians who contributed to this release of Firefox!
system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 2.3
 - Android 4.0
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
